alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 1:24PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
